title: Sushant Singh Rajput Says That He Never Would've Done Befikre
text:
facebook 
The recently released film Befikre has been in the news for all the wrong reasons. From the trailer leaving everyone slightly disappointed, to Aditya Chopra offering a not-so-sensible description of the protagonist, the film has had it rough. 
There was also a rumour doing the rounds that actor Sushant Singh Rajput was offered the leading role in the movie. This created a lot of stir among everybody. 
In a recent interview, Hindustan Times confirmed it with him once and for all. Here's what he had to say: 
"Let me clear it once and for all. I was never offered Befikre . But had I been offered, I wouldn't have done it. I know it's easier to decide after the results are out, but I have a reason. If the same production house is offering me a niche film like Detective Byomkesh Bakshy (2015), I would do it because Dibakar Banerjee has a different interpretation of the old classic; and I would do a Paani where Shekhar Kapur will be raising a very important and immediate issue..." 
Now we know.
